name: XAI Octagon Floating Rate & Alternative Income Term Trust
description: XAI Octagon Floating Rate & Alternative Income Term Trust is a closed-end fund that seeks to provide a high level of current income and capital appreciation by investing primarily in a diversified portfolio of senior secured floating rate loans and other alternative income investments. The fund was established to capitalize on the growing demand for floating rate securities, which can provide protection against rising interest rates. Managed by XAI Investments, the trust aims to achieve its investment objective by investing in a range of assets, including corporate loans, high-yield bonds, and other income-generating investments. The fund's strategy is focused on income generation, seeking to deliver attractive yields while preserving capital. With a team of experienced investment professionals, XAI Octagon Floating Rate & Alternative Income Term Trust employs rigorous credit analysis and a disciplined investment approach to navigate the complexities of the fixed income market. The trust also emphasizes diversification across various sectors and issuers to mitigate risk and enhance return potential. As investors look for reliable income sources in fluctuating economic conditions, this fund aims to be a valuable addition to income-focused portfolios.
